title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Unified multicloud observability (COP368)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 统一的多云可观测性 (COP368)
abstract: Multicloud environments present unique observability challenges such as enabling end-to-end visibility of distributed applications and dealing with fragmented tools. This lightning talk will showcase implementation patterns using both open source and cloud-native tooling. You'll leave with clear selection criteria for choosing the right pattern based on your organization's scale, technical constraints, and operational maturity.
abstract_cn: 多云环境带来了独特的可观测性挑战，例如实现分布式应用程序的端到端可见性以及处理碎片化的工具。本次闪电演讲将展示使用开源和云原生工具的实施模式。您将获得明确的选择标准，以便根据组织的规模、技术约束和运营成熟度选择合适的模式。
